content: Oil producer RSP Permian Inc  said it would buy oil and gas company Silver Hill Energy Partners for about $2.4 billion to expand its assets in the Permian Basin in Texas.
name: RSP Permian Inc
title: RSP Permian to buy Silver Hill Energy Partners for about $2.4 billion

content: Oct 13 Oil producer RSP Permian Inc  said it would buy oil and gas company Silver Hill Energy Partners for about $2.4 billion to expand its assets in the Permian Basin in Texas.
name: RSP Permian Inc
title: UPDATE 1-RSP Permian to buy Silver Hill Energy Partners for about $2.4 bln

content: Oct 13 Exploration and production company RSP Permian Inc said it would buy Silver Hill Energy Partners for a deal valued at about $2.4 billion to expand its assets in the Permian Basin in Texas.
name: RSP Permian Inc
title: RSP Permian to buy Silver Hill Energy Partners for about $2.4 bln

content: * RSP Permian announces $2.4 billion acquisition of Silver Hill Energy Partners and provides updates

title: BRIEF-RSP Permian announces $2.4 bln acquisition of Silver Hill Energy
